ReviewList.Text: This is an outstanding physics book. The discussion is straightforward. The examples are thoroughly explained. The practice problems at the end of each chapter test what has gone before. I especially like the fact that the answers to the problems are fully discussed. The author writes in a simple, uncomplicated manner so that there is no doubt in your mind what she is saying.
I agree with the above review. The only thing I can add is that the book is well thought out; Examples and sections build upon one another.
